title: Tarantella
data:

*For a list of all arthropods, see [list of arthropods](/List_of_arthropods "List of arthropods").*

| [Resistances](/Resistance "Resistance")                                             | None                                                                                  |

|   |                                                                                             |
| - | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A small but greatly-feared spider whose bite causes victims to break into a frenzied dance. |

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [3 Trivia](#Trivia)
- [4 History](#History)

## Useful Info

**Tarantellas** are non-[poisonous](/Poison "Poison") spiders that inflict [confusion](/Confusion "Confusion") with their touch. They are thankfully fairly fragile, but often appear along with other spiders. They can be found in the [Spider's Nest](/Spider%27s_Nest "Spider's Nest").

## Tips & Tricks

- [Poison resistance](/Poison_resistance "Poison resistance"), poison immunity, and [willpower](/Willpower "Willpower") do nothing to stop their confusion effect. Other than not getting hit, only [clarity](/Clarity "Clarity") can prevent the confusion.
- A [potion of curing](/Potion_of_curing "Potion of curing") will cure confusion. [Elyvilon](/Elyvilon "Elyvilon")'s Purification and [Ru](/Ru "Ru")'s Draw Out Power can also cure it.
- They're vulnerable to poison themselves, so [Mephitic Cloud](/Mephitic_Cloud "Mephitic Cloud") can take them out of commission easily.
- Tarantellas might be fragile, but they're fast and they hit about as hard as [yaks](/Yak "Yak"), even without the added confusion. Be careful if you're fighting lots of [spiders](/List_of_arachnids "List of arachnids") at once.

## Trivia

Note that these monsters aren't named "tarantulas"; instead, they are named after [tarantellas](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/tarantella "wikipedia:tarantella"), a type of Italian folk dance.

## History

- Prior to [0.17](/0.17 "0.17"), chunks from tarantella [corpses](/Corpse "Corpse") were poisonous.
html:
Tarantella

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.31: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.

For a list of all arthropods, see list of arthropods.

tarantella s 
HP 18-38
HD 8
XP 214
Speed 15
AC 3
EV 14
Will 20
Attack1 19 (touch: confuse)


Resistances None
Vulnerabilities Poison
Habitat Land
Intelligence Animal
Uses Uses nothing
Holiness Natural
Size Small
Type spider, tarantella
Flags No skeleton
Web immune
A small but greatly-feared spider whose bite causes victims to break into a frenzied dance.

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Tips & Tricks
  • 3 Trivia
  • 4 History

Useful Info

Tarantellas are non-poisonous spiders that inflict confusion with their touch. They are thankfully fairly fragile, but often appear along with other spiders. They can be found in the Spider's Nest.

Tips & Tricks

  • Poison resistance, poison immunity, and willpower do nothing to stop their confusion effect. Other than not getting hit, only clarity can prevent the confusion.
  • A potion of curing will cure confusion. Elyvilon's Purification and Ru's Draw Out Power can also cure it.
  • They're vulnerable to poison themselves, so Mephitic Cloud can take them out of commission easily.
  • Tarantellas might be fragile, but they're fast and they hit about as hard as yaks, even without the added confusion. Be careful if you're fighting lots of spiders at once.

Trivia

Note that these monsters aren't named "tarantulas"; instead, they are named after tarantellas, a type of Italian folk dance.

History

  • Prior to 0.17, chunks from tarantella corpses were poisonous.

rawPage:
{{version031}}
{{list of | arthropods}}
{{monster info}}

==Useful Info==
'''Tarantellas''' are non-[[poison]]ous spiders that inflict [[confusion]] with their touch. They are thankfully fairly fragile, but often appear along with other spiders. They can be found in the [[Spider's Nest]].

==Tips & Tricks==
*[[Poison resistance]], poison immunity, and [[willpower]] do nothing to stop their confusion effect. Other than not getting hit, only [[clarity]] can prevent the confusion.
*A [[potion of curing]] will cure confusion. [[Elyvilon]]'s Purification and [[Ru]]'s Draw Out Power can also cure it.
*They're vulnerable to poison themselves, so [[Mephitic Cloud]] can take them out of commission easily.
*Tarantellas might be fragile, but they're fast and they hit about as hard as [[yak]]s, even without the added confusion. Be careful if you're fighting lots of [[list of arachnids|spiders]] at once.

==Trivia==
Note that these monsters aren't named "tarantulas"; instead, they are named after [[wikipedia:tarantella|tarantella]]s, a type of Italian folk dance.

==History==
*Prior to [[0.17]], chunks from tarantella [[corpse]]s were poisonous.

[[Category:Arachnid]]
